entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Disallow MethodImplOptions.Synchronized for async lambdas #66530
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66591
    Area-Compilers
  • Split normalizer tests #66590
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66589
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Report when `MethodImplOptions.Synchronized` is used on async lambda #66568
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Change the version number to preview 6 #66580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 'main' into 'features\CollectionLiterals' #66586
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #66578
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: Add initial support for enumerables #66553
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
